alert.note: Alert for Las Vegas Valley; Northeast Clark County; Southern Clark County; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 12 at 7:49PM PDT until June 13 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph expected. Strongest winds are expected across the Western Las Vegas Valley downwind of the Spring Mountains. * WHERE...Far southern Nevada and northern San Bernardino County in California. This includes the Las Vegas Valley. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Tree limbs could be blown down from gusty winds and a few power outages may result. Reduced visibilities on area roadways possible due to blowing dust.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Las Vegas Valley; Northeast Clark County; Southern Clark County; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
